thread.title: G. KNIGHT
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av G. KNIGHT

author: G. KNIGHT
title: G. KNIGHT
text:
Many years ago, I found Ecco shoes and sandals to be the most comfortable footwear for my feet. One particular style became a favourite of mine due to its design and fit, and currently this model is called BABETT.
I always like to have a new pair 'in reserve' in case I have difficulty sourcing a new pair when needed. I have never ordered Ecco shoes online before but when I saw my favourite shoes at a reduced price in the Ecco sale, I decided to order them. The whole ordering process was very easy and I received updates on transit and delivery. The shoes were delivered in perfect condition.
